version_description: We’re updating the app to more relevant categories to make it easier to find.
We're improving the app to better understand what happens if crashes occur, so we can provide better fixes and enhancements.
Since we were mostly fixing bugs for this release, we decided to make this a really short read. Have fun playing - greatness awaits!

We're taking Kahoot! to the next level! This is an entirely new app that allows you to play learning games and train your superpowers anywhere and anytime. Challenge friends and family, play alone or assign kahoot challenges to make homework awesome!

We celebrated the release of our brand new app with a nice cake, and then immediately got back to work to roll out some improvements. This update includes a bunch of bug fixes; for example, now you can accept and play challenges that were created with private kahoots.

And just to recap: this is an entirely new app that allows you to play learning games and train your superpowers anywhere and anytime. Challenge friends and family, play alone or assign kahoot challenges to make homework awesome!

Hi there, Kahoot! just got better with these little updates:
- the countdown timer no longer covers parts of the image while playing
- if there’s a video included in a question, the countdown won’t start until the video has played.
- we fixed issues some of you had when logging in or trying to sign up

Meet the spooktacular October update! Here’s what we mixed in the magic potion:
- see the full leaderboard in the challenges you created
- when a challenge is over, check stats for each question and see which one was the trickiest
- review correct answers after you’ve played a challenge
- play a challenge again for revision after completing it for the first time
- it's Halloween! Find all the spooks we placed in the app to celebrate it!

Meet the spooktacular October update! Here’s what we mixed in the magic potion:
- see the full leaderboard in the challenges you created
- when a challenge is over, check stats for each question and see which one was the trickiest
- review correct answers after you’ve played a challenge
- play a challenge again for revision after completing it for the first time
- it's Halloween! Find all the spooks we placed in the app to celebrate it!

Find even more awesome quizzes with our improved search and challenge your friends!
New in this version:
- you can now share challenges on Remind
- search will autosuggest topics as you type
- suggested tags will help you find the most relevant quizzes
- play around with the new challenge options to manage game dynamics. Randomize the order of answers, hide the leaderboard from players, if you'd like, or turn off the timer in quizzes where you feel players need more time to think.
- speaking of challenges - anyone with a Kahoot! account can now create them!
- you can now edit your kahoots right in the app

Have fun playing!

- we improved the experience for setting challenge deadlines
- we left bugs no chances and fixed quite a few! (for example, fixed a sneaky one that caused crashes on iOS 9)

Don't miss these cool new features from the previous update:
- see the full leaderboard in the challenges you created
- when a challenge is over, check stats question by question and see which one was the trickiest
- review answers and images in each question after you played a challenge

Thank you, Kahoot!'ers! Here's what update 2.1.2 brings:
- added holiday theming to the app
- challenge your friends with your score from a live or practice game
- create your own quizzes from My Kahoots

Don't miss out on the new features from 2.1.0:
- we added a way to to see a game report when tapping on the leaderboard!

Ho-ho-holiday update! It comes with a "Xmas egg" - can you find it?
- Get in the festive mood with our winter and holiday kahoots
- Search was improved to give you more relevant results
- Kahoot! looks even better on iPhone X

Happy New Year! Here's the first update of 2018:
- answers in challenges will be randomized
- smooth way to close quizzes by dragging down

Happy New Year! Here's the first update of 2018:
- answers in challenges will be randomized
- smooth way to close quizzes by dragging down

Your Kahoot! homescreen got a cool new look - and new games, too! We added lots of quizzes you can play on your own or with your friends!

Choose from our own Kahoot! Studio's collections in Math, Science, English (ELA) or History if you'd like to reinforce classroom knowledge, or our trivia categories Trending and Popular.

Find even more awesome quizzes with our improved search and challenge your friends!

- search will autosuggest topics as you type
- suggested tags will help you find the most relevant quizzes
- play around with the new challenge options to manage game dynamics. Randomize the order of answers, hide the leaderboard from players, if you'd like, or turn off the timer in quizzes where you feel players need more time to think.
- speaking of challenges - anyone with a Kahoot! account can now create them!

Have fun playing!

Challenges aren't just fun - they also help you learn when you do homework or take remote training! We've added some new design touches to challenges gameplay so that you can review correct answers and reinforce learning.

Challenges aren't just fun - they also help you learn when you do homework or take remote training! We've added some new design touches to challenges gameplay so that you can review correct answers and reinforce learning.

Champion player, creative game designer or quizmaster - choose how you’ll Kahoot! today! In addition to playing and competing, now you can:
- Create your own quizzes in minutes
- Follow the kahoot checklist to create a high-quality quiz
- Take photos for questions with your camera
- Add existing photos from your camera roll
- Host a live game on your iPad
- Mirror a live game through AirPlay

Champion player, creative game designer or quizmaster - choose how you’ll Kahoot! today! In addition to playing and competing, now you can:
- Create your own quizzes in minutes
- Follow the kahoot checklist to create a high-quality quiz
- Take photos for questions with your camera
- Add existing photos from your camera roll
- Host a live game on your iPad
- Mirror a live game through AirPlay

Champion player, creative game designer or quizmaster - choose how you’ll Kahoot! today! In addition to playing and competing, now you can:
- Create your own quizzes in minutes
- Follow the kahoot checklist to create a high-quality quiz
- Take photos for questions with your camera
- Add existing photos from your camera roll
- Host a live game on your iPad
- Mirror a live game through AirPlay

Make back to school awesome with our app and its latest updates:
- create and host kahoots from your mobile device (in case you missed this before the summer break!)
- add images to kahoots from our built-in image library
- you can add videos, too - we've made it much easier now
- redesigned game reports will help you track and review player performance

Start the school year with our app and its latest updates:
- try creating and hosting kahoots from your mobile device
- make your kahoots beautiful with images from our built-in image library
- you can add videos, too - we’ve made it much easier now
- redesigned game reports will help you track and review player performance

Start the school year with our app and its latest updates:
- try creating and hosting kahoots from your mobile device
- make your kahoots beautiful with images from our built-in image library
- you can add videos, too - we’ve made it much easier now
- redesigned game reports will help you track and review player performance

TL;DR - we keep improving our app! For the most attentive Kahoot!’ers, here’s our detailed changelog:

- As an option, you can now add an intro video to kahoots you create
- We’ve optimized the experience in the image library to give you a better overview of the available images
- Now it’s possible to create a challenge even without an account
- We’ve improved the layout of our video importer on iPads
- As always, we’ve done a lot of bug fixing! For example, we’ve fixed the issue with keyboard randomly popping up on the hosting screen and the “Done” button sometimes going unresponsive in live games.

TL;DR - we keep improving our app! For the most attentive Kahoot!’ers, here’s our detailed changelog:
- As an option, you can now add an intro video to kahoots you create
- We’ve optimized the experience in the image library to give you a better overview of the available images
- Now it’s possible to create a challenge even without an account
- We’ve improved the layout of our video importer on iPads
- As always, we’ve done a lot of bug fixing! For example, we’ve fixed the issue with keyboard randomly popping up on the hosting screen and the “Done” button sometimes going unresponsive in live games.
We’ve added support for a new premium question type, open-ended questions, where players are prompted to type the correct answer. Try it out in our creator!

Say more with your kahoot: we’ve increased character limits in questions and answers.
Based on frequent requests, we’ve added the ability to replay kahoots as many times as you want in smart practice.

Get even more creative with your kahoots! Make your audience guess which picture you're showing with our image reveal feature. Also, you can now add puzzle questions to drag answers into the correct order.
Our first November update is a special for business Kahoot!’ers: now you can purchase a subscription and unlock features right in the app!
This update is mostly about bug fixing and improving performance. Also, our copywriter is on vacation, so no jokes or puns this time :)

Hot off the press, some more updates and improvements!
- you can access your own kahoots, including drafts, from a new section right on your home screen
- we’ve fixed some bugs, including one that caused a problem with search
Our first November update is a special for business Kahoot!’ers: now you can purchase a subscription and unlock features right in the app!
Our first November update is a special for business Kahoot!’ers: now you can purchase a subscription and unlock features right in the app!

What’s included in our latest update:
- teachers can now upgrade to Kahoot! Pro for schools in the app and unlock advanced features, such as an image library, folders and detailed reports
- yes, folders! Now you can organize your kahoots by topic, course or any other criteria (available with a premium subscription)

- If you’re using Kahoot! socially, you can unlock our image library to find images for your kahoots
- Autosuggestions in our image library will help you create kahoots with images even faster

Happy new year! We're back with several bug fixes, the classic Kahoot! icon and great mood!

Get more insights and personalize teaching or training with our new, detailed reports:
- see which questions were the most difficult
- find out which participants might need follow up
- identify topics/questions that need reinforcement

- We’ve added some shiny new icons and illustrations to make the app not only better looking, but more intuitive, too
- Teachers and business users will now be able to invite more players to their challenges when they upgrade to Kahoot! Plus or Kahoot! Pro. Bigger games mean you can have a school-wide or company-wide competition or learning assignment!
This update is mostly about bug fixing and improving performance. Also, our copywriter is on vacation, so no jokes or puns this time :)

Meet this spring's first app update!
- get image suggestions when using our image library based on kahoot title, questions and answers
- unlock more advanced features in Kahoot! for family and friends
- and, as always, we've fixed some bugs to make your experience even better!

Get an Access Pass to try our newest features:
- master kahoots - play them in several steps over time to maximize how much you remember
- as you progress towards mastery, win emotes, fun reactions, and use them when playing challenges

- as you progress towards mastery, win emotes, fun reactions, and use them when playing challenges

Practice makes perfect - and gets rewarded!
- ace kahoots with smart practice by playing them in several steps over time
- collect emotes - fun, animated reactions - as a reward when you ace kahoots

You can now find your collected emotes in your profile area.

- New to Kahoot!? Get started with simple tasks right on your home screen
- See all your key stats in your Profile area, get an overview of emotes you collected, and access smart practice
- Enjoy a smooth Kahoot! experience without all the bugs we’ve just fixed!

Our latest updates in a nutshell:
— share games directly with other Kahoot! users
— get access to your drafts and continue working on them in the app and on the web
— we’ve added brand new animations throughout challenges and practice games
We’ve added new animations and redesigned the gameplay in self-paced kahoots (challenges) - have you checked out the updates yet? Share your feedback on Twitter by tagging @GetKahoot!

Get even more creative with your kahoots! Make your audience guess which picture you're showing with our image reveal feature. Also, you can now add puzzle questions to drag answers into the correct order.
Now you can add drawings to your kahoots, or add annotations on top of images, thanks to our newly added Pencil Kit support, new feature in iOS 13. Have fun drawing!

Now you can add drawings to your kahoots, or add annotations on top of images, thanks to our newly added Pencil Kit support, new feature in iOS 13. Have fun drawing!
We have also added exciting player features supporting the new Kahoot! Academy offering for business.

Meet our spooktacular Halloween update! In addition to the frightfully festive look, we’re treating you with new features:
- raise stakes by awarding double points in a question - use them wisely!
- preview separate questions when you’re creating your kahoot so you know what they’re going to look like for players
Happy Kahoot!’ing!

- you can use player identifier in challenges to know the person behind the nickname (Academy for business)
- personalized learning is now supported for challenges, too!
- Kahoot! Premium for schools is now available in the app
- not sure which plan to choose? Our new comparison pages will help you get an overview of key features

- you can use player identifier in challenges to know the person behind the nickname (Academy for business)
- personalized learning is now supported for challenges, too!
- Kahoot! Premium for schools is now available in the app
- not sure which plan to choose? Our new comparison pages will help you get an overview of key features
We’ve added a new question type for higher ed, business and social accounts: give players a voice with an interactive word cloud!
We’ve added support for a new premium question type, open-ended questions, where players are prompted to type the correct answer. Try it out in our creator!
We’ve added support for a new premium question type, open-ended questions, where players are prompted to type the correct answer. Try it out in our creator!

Happy new year! We’re kicking it off with a bunch of new things and fixes:
- new design of the kahoot details page
- improved flow for creating and playing challenges
- new report pages for players and game hosts
- the ability to see a previous game report for each kahoot from its details page
- issues with live hosting fixes
- accessibility fixes

- Replay a game with all the scores! If some players were not able to join your game, we have a great new feature for you: create a challenge and include all the scores from the original game. This new feature is available from game reports.
- Many accessibility fixes for the challenge game play and the creator.

- Replay a game with all the scores! If some players were not able to join your game, we have a great new feature for you: create a challenge and include all the scores from the original game. This new feature is available from game reports.
- Many accessibility fixes for the challenge game play and the creator.

This update is focused on stability improvements and bug fixes but don’t miss out on our recent updates:
- Replay a game with all the scores! If some players were not able to join your game, we have a great new feature for you: create a challenge and include all the scores from the original game. This new feature is available from game reports.
- Many accessibility fixes for the challenge game play and the creator.

This update is focused on stability improvements and bug fixes but don’t miss out on our recent updates:
- Replay a game with all the scores! If some players were not able to join your game, we have a great new feature for you: create a challenge and include all the scores from the original game. This new feature is available from game reports.
- Many accessibility fixes for the challenge game play and the creator.

We’ve worked on a whole bunch of things to include in our first spring update:
- the home screen got a new, clutter-free design and improved navigation
- the Discover section has moved to its own area together with search
- you can find all kahoots and reports under My games
- reports now include quick filters instead of tabs, making it easier to find the one you need

- For students: practice and review content in the new Study area of the app
- For teachers and business users: stay up to date with our news and tips in the “What’s new” section
- For all kahoot creators: we’ve removed limitations on how many slides you can add in a row, to make it easier to prepare your interactive presentation with Kahoot!

Raise the stakes and decrease guesswork with multi-select answers in quiz questions! Players will be able to select multiple answer alternatives they think are correct and get a chance to win up to 4,000 points if they get them all right. Beware - if one of the selected options is incorrect, then no points are awarded at all!
Multi-select answers are also supported in poll questions, allowing you to collect more granular feedback.

Raise the stakes and decrease guesswork with multi-select answers in quiz questions! Players will be able to select multiple answer alternatives they think are correct and get a chance to win up to 4,000 points if they get them all right. Beware - if one of the selected options is incorrect, then no points are awarded at all!
Multi-select answers are also supported in poll questions, allowing you to collect more granular feedback.

We’ve added flashcards and other new study modes to review content and study at home:
- Flashcards: learn a new topic, memorize facts and revisit a topic before tests
- Practice: play without a timer until you’ve aced all questions
- Test yourself: compete against AI players and unlock emotes
- Challenge friends: see if they can beat your score

Recently, we launched flashcards and other new study modes to review content and study at home. Now we’ve added some improvements:
- unlock emotes as you’re making progress with study modes
- we’ve improved the AI players you can compete with in “Test yourself” mode and added emotes

- unlock emotes as you’re making progress with study modes
- we’ve improved the AI players you can compete with in “Test yourself” mode and added emotes

In addition we fixed a crash affecting users on iOS 9.3x.

Here’s what we’ve been up to:
- We renamed open-ended questions to type answer to improve clarity
- We looked under the hood of study modes to make them even better
- We further improved our support for Schoolwork 2.0
New question type! Give players a voice, spark a discussion and collect valuable feedback with new open-ended questions.

Kahoot! is now available in Spanish! Try it out and let your Spanish-speaking friends know!
In other news, we’ve reworked scoring in the “Test Yourself” study mode.

Create study leagues and compete with your friends no matter where they are. They work as virtual study groups where you decide which kahoots to add and when to play. This feature is available for students

We’ve added a new iOS 14 widget and updated our app to support this iOS version! Add this new widget to your device’s homescreen to see personalized recommendations for kahoots to study or choose from our daily top picks.

Express yourself and have fun with Bitmoji in Kahoot! Add it as your profile picture and use it when playing in leagues.
Other updates:
- better performance of the Discover section
- improved layout in slides
- bug fixes

Bonjour! Oi! Hei! The Kahoot! app is now available in Brazilian Portuguese, French and Norwegian!
Now available in French, Brazilian Portuguese and Norwegian, in addition to English and Spanish.

Happy new year! Here’s what’s included in our first app update of 2021:
- Change question type in one tap while creating a kahoot
- Enjoy an improved layout of the Discover section with game recommendations
- Fixed some issues, including a problem with joining challenges

- Change question type in one tap while creating a kahoot
- Enjoy an improved layout of the Discover section with game recommendations

This update features an improved Discover page: now, it’ll load significantly faster! We’ve also added dedicated pages for Kahoot! Academy’s Premium partners and Verified educators, which will make it easier for you to navigate high quality game recommendations.

In other news - now you can paste an image from the clipboard when creating your own games.

This update features an improved Discover page: now, it’ll load significantly faster! We’ve also added dedicated pages for Kahoot! Academy’s Premium partners and Verified educators, which will make it easier for you to navigate high quality game recommendations.

In other news - now you can download advanced spreadsheet versions of your game reports.
Playing together with your family? Our Kahoot!+ Family subscription now includes two new learning apps for kids to make math awesome: Kahoot! DragonBox Algebra 5+ and Algebra 12+

- Under the new Library tab you’ll find all your games and reports.
- Introducing groups for teachers and business users: share kahoots with your colleagues! You can access your groups and kahoots shared within them from the Library tab.

- Add classic slides to your kahoots - free for teachers and students!
- Unlock advanced slide layouts by upgrading your subscription
- Find all your games and reports under the new Library tab
- Introducing groups for teachers and business users: share kahoots with your colleagues! You can access your groups and kahoots shared within them from the Library tab.
Now available in German and Italian, in addition to English, Spanish, French, Brazilian Portuguese and Norwegian.

We’ve rolled out several updates to help you discover new kahoots and enjoyed an improved game experience:
- Access Verified educator and Premium partner profiles and choose kahoots from their collections
- New look of the homescreen and its sections
- New top bar in the gameplay experience to show you the progress through the game
- Added haptics throughout the game experience
- As always, important bug fixes!

Here are some of the highlights of the latest version:
- Now, it’s even easier to connect your Bitmoji to Kahoot! if you have the Bitmoji app on your device
- We’ve redesigned the navigation bar in the player experience so you can fully focus on the game
- Teachers and higher ed instructors can now get a Premium+ subscription through our app
